âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Collects, processes, aggregates, and writes metrics, logs, and other data â€¢ Offers over 300 plugins for various functionalities (system monitoring, cloud services, message passing) â€¢ Supports user-defined code for data collection and transformation â€¢ Compiles into a standalone static binary without external dependencies
ðŸ“– Summary: Telegraf is an agent for collecting and processing various types of data. It boasts a wide array of plugins and allows for user-defined code integration, simplifying data handling. Its standalone binary and TOML configuration ensure streamlined deployment and ease of use.
